ai-patthana8.67:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.67:1.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of restraint ...
ai-patthana8.67:2.1_0: There is no reason for teaching that gives rise to the following for species, namely, with sense spheres as condition: mind,
ai-patthana8.67:3.1_0: Not conducting themselves well, nor doing what is the cause, but not the reason for teaching?
ai-patthana8.67:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana8.67:4.1_0: ‘... for the sake of nine objects.’ ...
